item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: We are constantly adding new features and optimization to the mobile app. It's a sign of progress and dedication. And I must commend the team for keeping the Atomic vision alive.
item.content:encoded: We are constantly adding new features and optimization to the mobile app. It’s a sign of progress and dedication. And I must commend the team for keeping the Atomic vision alive.

item.title: By: Elpriist
item.dc:creator: Elpriist
item.description: I bought some $HBar from binance exchange, and it's been on my exchange wallet since then. Thanks for supporting the $hbar. It spares me alot of stress and I'm not open to vulnerabilities anymore.
item.content:encoded: I bought some $HBar from binance exchange, and it’s been on my exchange wallet since then. Thanks for supporting the $hbar. It spares me alot of stress and I’m not open to vulnerabilities anymore.

item.title: By: Steven

item.description: Never knew I could buy Dash and stable coins on atomic using bank card. Wow! This is a great development. Will try it soon
